pull.title: trivial: Removes unsed `CBloomFilter` constructor.
pull.body: This pull request removes the `CBloomFilter::CBloomFilter(const unsigned int, const double, const unsigned int)` constructor, which became obsolete with 086ee67.

events.message:
Removes unsed `CBloomFilter` constructor.

This commit removes the `CBloomFilter::CBloomFilter(const unsigned int, const double, const unsigned int)` constructor, which became obsolete with 086ee67.

events.body:
